name: Shyftrs
storyline:
Explore the Kingdom of Aden as you try to find your parents and your way back home.
You will battle ancient creatures, solve puzzles, and explore different environments as you go deep beneath the ruined temple or go high above an ancient tree.

Join Brams as he embarks on a journey to investigate the disappearance of his parents, and to explore a land that he has yet to see while seeking answers about the secrets that lie beyond the world that he has known.

Will he be able to return or be trapped forever?
summary: Shyftrs is a 2D stylized action adventure metroidvania game that will take you on a journey to uncover the mysteries of your lineage and the world beyond. Your weapon of choice are Cane Sword, Pistol or use your new found prowess. Step up and embrace the adventure.
